subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: The rivalry between Connecticut and Tennessee in women’s basketball took a step toward renewal on the court when each team was awarded a No. 1 seed in the N.C.A.A. tournament pairings.
snippet: The rivalry between Connecticut and Tennessee in women’s basketball took a step toward renewal on the court when each team was awarded a No. 1 seed in the N.C.A.A. tournament pairings.
